summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing agreements with the Washington State Department of Transportation; making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Seattle General Street Improvement Bonds, 1960 Fund for the completion of plans, specifications, estimates and construction of the South Lucile Street Bridge project; authorizing the Director of Engineering to appraise, negotiate for and acquire necessary property and property rights; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department; and authorizing the hiring of consultants; and the awarding of contracts.
